Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Repeals the empire state jobs retention program credit
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the empire state jobs retention program credit.
LawCode: Rpld §36, §606 sub§ (tt), §1511 sub§ (bb), Tax L; rpld §425 sub 3, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal section 36, subsection (tt) of section 606, and subsection (bb) of section 1511 of the tax law and subdivision 3 of section 425 of the economic development law relating to the empire state jobs retention program credit
